tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_decision_support_system (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  guideline_ref VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)
CREATE TABLE clinical_decision_support (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    patient_id INT NOT NULL,    diagnosis TEXT NOT NULL,    treatment TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE evidence_based_guidelines (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    guideline_name TEXT NOT NULL,    description TEXT NOT NULL,    created_by TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name TEXT,
   age INT,
   gender TEXT,
   diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_table (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   guideline TEXT,
   level TEXT,
   source TEXT,
   description TEXT
);
